title: Challenge 6: Servo
description: Control a servo motor with PWM.
codeSolution:
from machine import Pin, PWM
import time

servo = PWM(Pin(5))
servo.freq(50)

while True:
    servo.duty(30)
    time.sleep(1)
    servo.duty(75)
    time.sleep(1)
